system.useTime:
Khorne: Daemonhost's Natural Weapons gain +2 Penetration and Tearing Quality. Attack rolls that score 3+ DoS inflict Blood Loss. Can enter a Frenzy as a Free Action.
Tzeentch: Daemonhost can re-roll any failed Focus Power Test. If result of either die on the second roll is a 9, causes Psychic Phenomena, or adds +10 to the result if it was already caused by the roll.
Nurgle: Daemonhost's Natural Weapons gain Toxic (3) Quality. Non-sanctified or other special weapons, armour, and equipment within 10m act as if they were Poor Quality.
Slaanesh: Daemonhost's natural weapons gain +1 Penetration and Shocking QUality. Attacks impose -20 to Evasion Tests.
